name: arizonan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Arizona: Most Arizonans rely on electricity, with only about 1,500 homes using solar power. He is an Arizonian who has searched for meteorites for 15 years.
More examplesFewer examplesMcCain praised O'Connor, a fellow Arizonan.All Arizonans would have to show proof of citizenship when registering to vote.Like a growing number of Arizonians, he thinks organized religion is far from divine.

belonging or relating to the US state of Arizona or its people: The company was started by two Arizonan brothers. The Arizonan desert already has 402 golf courses.
More examplesFewer examplesWe were stuck in the Arizonian wilderness with the sun beating down.Arizonan employers could take advantage of the vast pool of potential workers just across the border.She ordered native Arizonan plants.
